sourceMeaningMnemonic: A long time ago a huge <radical>tsunami</radical> swept a <radical>triceratops</radical> up into the <radical>moon</radical> and <kanji>extinguish</kanji>ed its life.
meaningInfo: I’m sure you’ve heard many theories on how dinosaurs went extinct. Well, this is the real story. Imagine this poor triceratops and all his friends being extinguished by this powerful tsunami, sweeping them up into the moon where there's no air to breathe or leaves to eat.
readingMnemonic: This famous event where almost all life was <kanji>extinguish</kanji>ed is reenacted every year for the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>). He's got a bit of an unhealthy obsession with extinguishing life...
readingInfo: Watch the Shougun's eyes light up as an actor dressed like a tsunami crashes into an actor dressed as a triceratops and all of the lights on the stage are extinguished. Spooky...
